name: Train Driver Journey Simulator
description:
Become a real train driver and carry deliver freights!
Do you prefer travelling by car, by plane or by train? Every journey is a new experience, maybe train is not as fast as airplane or sport cat, but it has its own romanticism and beauty. Admire amazing landscapes and cover long distance – you’re not a passenger, you are a driver! Train driver’s cabin at your disposal. Train Driver Journey Simulator – let’s start our amazing trip!
Drive your train using control panel. Deliver important freights and score points. Enjoy the sound of wheels and enjoy your journey!
Train Driver Journey Simulator GAME FEATURES:
Real train driving simulation;
Deliver freights and earn points;
Feel like an engine driver;
Realistic controls and physics;
Beautiful landscapes;
Amazing graphics and sound effects.
Train Driver Journey Simulator – you will be the best train driver! Choo-choo!
